title: Android 10 asking for Factory reset on boot in Pixel 3.
content:
With much difficulty and after repeated factory reset, I installed Android 10 on my P3. Now the new problem which I am facing with my phone is it's crashing and restarting  and it's asking for factory reset every time it is restarting. and also its is asking for factory reset when ever I am restarting my phone. so I am scared to restart or power off my phone.
The error message saying " Cannot load Android System. Your data may be corrupt. If you continue to get this message, you may need to perform a factory reset and erase all user data stored on this device."
